attributes.action: Suspend Parliament, re-instate the Queen, create a new government for the people
attributes.additional_details: We the people should exercise our power over the government we now disapprove of and create a new one that will work for us not against us as is our rights as citizens
attributes.background: In light of the current chaos we call government, it needs overthrowing and starting again without the political cliques and involvement of bankers that corrupt the distribution and management of power and policies in the country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "re-instate the Queen, create a new government for the people".

You could start a new petition setting out the constitutional change you would like.

If you would like Parliament suspended until the UK has left the European Union then you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237487
